short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stylus is a OpenAI Chrome extension designed to compose emails, generate replies in seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stylus is an innovative Chrome extension powered by OpenAI, designed to revolutionize the way you handle your emails. 
With the ability to understand and compose emails, Stylus is your personal assistant for all email correspondence. 
Whether you're drafting new messages or looking for the perfect reply, Stylus generates coherent and contextually appropriate responses in seconds, streamlining your communication and boosting productivity. 
Say goodbye to email fatigue and hello to efficient, AI-powered writing with Stylus.
